thread.title: Brandon Thomas
thread.title_full: Veterans United Home Loans reviewed by Brandon Thomas

author: Brandon Thomas
title: Brandon Thomas
text: The purchase of my new home was as easier than expected. Veterans United made everything easy to understand, answered any questions I had and was awesome to work with. Had the best home buying experience ever. Thank you Veterans United.
